name: Absorb Magic
rules: Destroy target ability. If you do, your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ability's cost.

name: Adrenaline Rush
rules: Combat Hero Required; Ready all of your resources. Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size. At end of turn, discard your hand.
flavour: Let'sget'em! Whatarewewaitingfor? Gogogo!

name: Arcane Brilliance
rules: Each friendly player draws a card.; Ongoing: Each friendly player's maximum hand size is increased by three.

name: Arcane Explosion
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally. Draw a card for each character dealt damage this way.

name: Ardent Defender
rules: Protection Hero Required; Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero while it has 25 or more damage.

name: Aspect of the Cheetah
rules: Ongoing: You pay 1 less to complete quests, to a minimum of 1.; When your hero is dealt damage, put Aspect of the Cheetah from play into its owner's hand.
flavour: It turns three days' travel into two days, provided no one gets in the way. - Chaigon Steelsight

name: Banish
rules: Remove target Demon ally or Elemental ally from the game.
flavour: When you draw power from demons, it's a good idea to have a backup plan in case they disagree.

name: Barkskin
rules: Ongoing: Your ability, ally, and equipment cards can't be interrupted.

name: Bestial Swiftness
rules: Beast Mastery Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Target Pet has Ferocity this turn.

name: Blessed Protector
rules: Your hero has Protector this turn.; Draw a card.

name: Blind
rules: Target player can't play cards this turn.

name: Bling
rules: Ongoing: You can have up to ten Rings.

name: Bloody Welcome
rules: Your hero deals 3 ranged damage to target ally. If that ally entered play this turn, ready up to two of your resources.
flavour: I've been expecting you.

name: Chasten
rules: Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Cheat Death
rules: Subtlety Hero Required; Remove your hero from the game. As your next turn starts, put it into play flipped the same way and with the same damage. (You can't play cards while your hero is removed.)

name: Chill
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.

name: Cold Front
rules: Allies can't attack this turn.
flavour: I'll freeze you all! - The Shade of Aran

name: Crippling Shot
rules: Target hero or ally has -5 ATK this turn.
flavour: A well-placed shot can weaken the strongest arm and slow the swiftest hand.

name: Curse of Contagion
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached ally.; When attached ally is destroyed, you may put Curse of Contagion from it owner's graveyard into play attached to target ally.

name: Double Barrel
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Ranged dual wield. (Can have a second Ranged weapon. Can strike with a second Ranged weapon during the same combat.)
flavour: Sometimes you need a little extra firepower to get the job done.

name: Drain Mana
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy Drain Mana unless you pay 4.; At the end of your turn, target opponent discards a card and you draw a card.
flavour: Tremendous power comes from a warlock's ability to sustain complex rituals.

name: Dreamstate
rules: Balance Hero Required; Ongoing: When you play a Balance ability, draw a card.
flavour: Those who walk the Emerald Dream see the waking world more clearly.

name: Druid Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has [Exhaust] -> Exhaust target ally.

name: Earth and Sky
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally; or your hero deals 2 arcane damage to target hero or ally and you draw a card.

name: Earthrend Weapon
rules: Attach to one of your Melee weapons.; Ongoing: Attached weapon has +7 ATK.

name: Earth's Bounty
rules: Put target card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: The earth speaks to me. It will grant me what I need.

name: Echo of the Elements
rules: If an opposing ally would deal any type of damage, it deals shadow damage instead.

name: Elements' Fury
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero and 3 nature damage to target ally.

name: Exorcism
rules: Destroy target Demon ally or Undead ally.
flavour: The Light glares brightest upon the most sinister of foes.

name: Fel Pact
rules: Attach to target Demon ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally can't be destroyed.

name: Feral Instinct
rules: Feral Hero Required; Ongoing: While in cat form, your hero has +2 ATK while attacking an exhausted defender. While in bear form, your hero has +4 ATK while protecting.

name: Fire Power
rules: Fire Hero Required; Ongoing: When you play a Fire ability or Fire card, your hero may deal 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Fire magi focus their training on maximizing the potency and impact of their fire-based spells.

name: Fuel for the Fire
rules: Ongoing: Destroy one of your resources -> Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target ally.

name: Gear Upgrade
rules: As an additional cost to play Gear Upgrade, destroy one of your equipment.; Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: Gift of the Wild
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +2 ATK / +2 health.

name: Head Trauma
rules: Destroy target resource.

name: Heartening Arrival
rules: Ongoing: When an ally enters play under your control, your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Hide and Stab
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Stealth. (Can't protect against it.); When your hero deals damage, destroy Hide and Stab.; Destroy Hide and Stab -> Exhaust target hero or ally.

name: Holy Nova
rules: Holy Hero Required; Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally and heals 1 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Hunter Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.; Ongoing: When an opposing ally enters play, attached ally deals 1 ranged damage to it.

name: Infusion of Fortitude
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 health.

name: Intensify Rage
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 ATK / +3 health.; At the start of your turn, put 2 damage on attached ally.

name: Invigorating Touch
rules: Your hero heals 6 damage from target hero.

name: Invoke the Nether
rules: Remove all allies from the game.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),March of the Legion (EA),Archive
flavour: It all ends here. - Forang Deathrattle

name: Judgement of Light
rules: Attach to target opposing hero or ally.; Ongoing: When a friendly hero or ally deals combat damage to attached character, that friendly character heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Judgement of Wisdom
rules: Attach to target opposing hero or ally.; Ongoing: When a friendly hero or ally deals combat damage to attached character, that friendly character's controller draws a card.

name: Kindred Spirits
rules: Ongoing: Your hero can't be destroyed while another friendly hero or ally is in play.

name: Kiting
rules: Attach to target ally.; 1 -> Target hero or ally can't deal combat damage to attached ally this turn. Use only once per turn.

name: Mage Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has [Exhaust] -> This ally deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Magma Spike
rules: Your hero deals 5 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Closer! Come closerâ€¦and burn! - Keli'dan the Breaker

name: Mana Spring Totem
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, draw a card.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)
flavour: Water is the element of life and energy.

name: Martyr's Mending
rules: Your hero heals any amount of damage from other friendly heroes and allies. Put that much damage on your hero.

name: Meeting Stone
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust], Exhaust two allies in your party -> Search your deck for an ally card and put it into play.

name: Mental Anguish
rules: Target player discards two cards.
flavour: It may all be in your head, but that doesn't make it hurt any less.

name: Natural Genesis
rules: Ongoing: Each player may place an additional resource during his turn.

name: Nether Fracture
rules: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.

name: Obfuscate
rules: Target hero or ally has +2 ATK while attacking and has Stealth this turn. (Can't protect against it.)

name: On the Brink
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: When attached ally becomes exhausted, destroy it.

name: Paladin Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.; Ongoing: When attached ally deals combat damage, it also heals that much from target hero or ally.

name: Paper Airplane
rules: Put Paper Airplane on top of target player's deck. (He owns it for the rest of the game.)
flavour: Whee!

name: Piercing Howl
rules: Fury Hero Required; Target opponent puts three allies from his party on top of their owner's decks.
flavour: A warrior's deafening howl can break an enemy's ranks from within.

name: Portal
rules: Search your deck for an ally card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
flavour: The shortest distance between two points is one incantation. - Blaize Brightspark

name: Prayer of Fortitude
rules: Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +5 health.
flavour: Just as the Light connects all our hearts and souls, so let it protect us now in these dark and troubled times. - Kintara Wintermoon

name: Priest Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has [Exhaust] -> This ally heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Puncture
rules: Destroy target ally or equipment.

name: Reclusion
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Prevent all damage that attached ally would deal.

name: Reincarnation
rules: Ongoing: If your hero would be destroyed, remove Reincarnation from the game and remove all but 14 damage from your hero instead.
flavour: Death cannot thwart the will of the elements. I still have much work to do. - Urrth

name: Retaliation
rules: Ongoing: You pay 10 less to strike with melee weapons while your hero is defending.

name: Rogue Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.; Ongoing: When attached ally deals combat damage to a defending hero, that hero's controller discards a card.

name: Sacred Purification
rules: Destroy target ability. If it was attached to a friendly hero or ally, draw a card.

name: Safeguard
rules: Ready your hero.; Ongoing: Your hero has Protector.

name: Salt the Wounds
rules: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally with damage.; Draw a card.
flavour: All shall feel my wrath. - Halavar

name: Sanctity Aura
rules: Retribution Hero Required; Ongoing: Holy allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking.; If your hero would deal holy damage, it deals that much +2 instead.
flavour: From the youngest child to the most veteran soldier, the Light heartens all who are worthy.

name: Sentry Totem
rules: Ongoing: When an opposing ally enters play, exhaust it.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)
flavour: Aided by the Spirit of Air, a shaman may be able to see faraway objects or events, whether the distance be physical or temporal.

name: Serpent Sting
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character, or 2 if you have a Ranged weapon.
flavour: Laced with poisonous toxins, the serpent sting burns the very blood of its target.

name: Shadow Weaving
rules: Shadow Hero Required; Attach to target opposing hero or ally.; Ongoing: If attached character would be dealt shadow damage, it's dealt that much +2 instead.

name: Shaman Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.; Ongoing: When attached ally attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready it.

name: Sheath of Light
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target ally this turn.

name: Shred
rules: Ongoing: When Shred enters play, your hero may deal 2 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.; Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
flavour: Of course claws are better than a weapon: they have three times the blades! - Arktos

name: Siphon Life
rules: Affliction Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Soul Inversion
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK / -2 health.
flavour: There's always a cost for power - you just have to decide whether or not you can afford it. - Forang Deathrattle

name: Sprint
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Choose one: Ready your hero, or if your hero is defending, remove all attacking allies from combat.
flavour: Sometimes you just have to get away from it all.

name: Stoneclaw Totem
rules: Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can attack only Stoneclaw Totem if able.; When a hero or ally deals combat damage to Stoneclaw Totem, that character can't ready during its controller's next ready step.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies)

name: Strangling Roots
rules: Attach to target ally and exhaust it.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.; At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached ally.
flavour: The roots not only grip like steel, but they cut like it as well.

name: Sustain or Reclaim
rules: Choose one: Your hero heals all damage from target ally; or put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Druids understand the interdependence of all living things. When this delicate equilibrium is disrupted, the druid works to restore the balance.

name: Swallow Soul
rules: Interrupt target ally card. If you do, remove it from the game.
flavour: Shaza-kie!!

name: Swipe
rules: Ongoing: When Swipe enters play, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.; Your hero is in bear form. (Has Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
flavour: Maybe forming into a line wasn't such a good idea.

name: The Light's Largess
rules: Ongoing: Destroy The Light's Largess -> Your hero heals 6 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Thick as Thieves
rules: Ongoing: Allies with Stealth in your party are Elusive and Untargetable.

name: Thrill of the Hunt
rules: Survival Hero Required; Destroy target ally. If you do, ready up to X of your resources, where X is that ally's cost.

name: Thundering Footsteps
rules: As an additional cost to play Thundering Footsteps, stomp your feet. Put a Mechanical ally token named Fel Reaver with 10 ATK / 10 health into play.
flavour: Do you hear something?

name: Totem of Wrath
rules: Elemental Hero Required; Ongoing: If an ally in your party would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +2 instead.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Totemic Focus
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play totems.

name: Touch of Darkness
rules: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. If a hero is dealt damage this way, its controller discards a card.
flavour: Even a brush with the shadow can teat a mind apart.

name: Touch of Ice
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. If a hero is dealt damage this way, the next time its controller would draw a card this turn, he skips drawing that card instead.

name: Touch of the Arcane
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card for each damage dealt this way.

name: Track Demons
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, look at the top card of your deck. Either put it in your hand and put 3 damage on your hero, or put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Twist of Faith
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: You control attached ally.
flavour: Your will is weak. Your mind is mine.

name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
rules: Arms Hero Required; Ongoing: Your Two-Handed weapons have +5 ATK.

name: Unfair Advantage
rules: As an additional cost to play Unfair Advantage, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game.; Target player discards that many cards.

name: Unrelenting Assault
rules: You can't play other cards this turn.; If you've played no other cards this turn, when your hero attacks this turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready your hero and all of your Melee weapons.

name: Wand Specialization
rules: Arcane Hero Required; Ongoing: Your wands have +2 ATK; When you strike with a Wand, your hero has Long-Range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

name: Warlock Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.; Ongoing: When attached ally attacks, you may put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.

name: Warrior Training
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.; Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can attack only attached ally if able.

name: Withering Shout
rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -1 health.

name: Wound Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.; Ongoing: Attached character can't be healed.; At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character.

name: Wreck
rules: Interrupt target equipment card.

name: Acid Hands McGillicutty
rules: When Acid Hands is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: A'dal
rules: Prevent all damage that would be dealt.
flavour: (You are safe here.)

name: Adyen the Lightwarden
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Cards can't leave opposing graveyards.

name: Aldana
rules: Your weapons have +2 ATK while your hero is defending.
flavour: Come on. I'll even let you take the first shot.

name: Alhas
rules: At the start of your turn, Alhas heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Light be with you.

name: Anchorite Alonora
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Inspire: Ally (Ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)

name: Anchorite Jaliah
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); When an ally in your party is destroyed, Jaliah heals 2 damage from each hero and ally in your party.
flavour: Though I cannot save everyone, I can certainly do my best to try.

name: Anchorite Viluaa
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Inspire: Hero (Ready your hero during each other player's ready step.)

name: Anders Blankheart
rules: Elusive; If damage would be dealt with an ability you control to a hero or ally it's attached to, that much +1 is dealt instead.

name: Arazzius the Cruel
rules: When Arazzius attacks, each player destroys an ally in his party.
flavour: You will find him at the Pools of Aggonar. If not, his evil will most certainly find you. - Force Commander Danath Trollbane

name: Arcane Guardian
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Protector; Arcane Guardian has +1 ATK / +1 health for each card in your hand.

name: Arcanist Avelena
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Ability (This ally can attack opposing abilities.); When Avelena sabotages an ability, put it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Arcanist Raith
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Opponents play with the top card of their decks revealed.
flavour: Feeling a little exposed? That might be my fault.

name: Arcanist Tian
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); You may look at the top card of your deck at any time.

name: Archbishop Benedictus
rules: Heroes and allies can't attack.

name: Arlek Stonehilt
rules: Elusive; Each of your armor has +5 DEF while your hero is defending.
flavour: Take care of your armor, and it will take care of you.

name: Arnerus Brightsteppe
rules: Each of your armor has +5 DEF while your hero is attacking.

name: Bakaar
rules: Your hero has Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
flavour: How much can you know about yourself if you've never been on a hunt?

name: Blademistress Lyss
rules: When an opposing hero or ally deals damage to Lyss, ready up to that many of your resources.

name: Blinky
rules: 3 -> Remove Blinky from the game and put a warp counter on him.; 3, Remove a warp counter -> Put Blinky into play. Use only if Blinky is removed from the game.
flavour: Terokkar Forest is a bad place to travel if you're jumpy.

name: Bizzazz
rules: When Bizzazz enters play, draw a card.

name: Blood Knight Tarae
rules: Protector; 1 -> Remove target ability card in a graveyard from the game. If you do, Tarae heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Bloodblade
rules: Bloodblade can attack only heroes.

name: Bloodeye
rules: Bloodeye can attack only heroes.
flavour: Have you heard of my brothers? No? Good.

name: Bloodsoul
rules: Bloodsoul can attack only heroes.
flavour: Doom comes for you, and it takes pleasure in your resistance.

name: Bolan Earthmend
rules: Protector; When Bolan readies, he heals all damage from target ally.
flavour: The wind lets nothing stop its movement, so why should you?

name: Captain Swash
rules: Swash has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: 'Dashing' isn't a word I'd use to describe an orc - unless he were running. - Kintara Wintermoon

name: Caretaker Devonar
rules: Protector; Devonar is Elusive while ready.

name: Caretaker Heartwing
rules: Heartwing is Untargetable while ready.

name: Caretaker Mooncrier
rules: Ready allies in your party have +2 ATK.

name: Champion Zosimuus
rules: When a Holy ally in your party is dealt damage, it deals 2 holy damage to the source of that damage.
flavour: Retribution is swift upon the enemies of the Light.

name: Cholda Wildbloom
rules: When Cholda enters play, you and target opponent each put the top card of your decks into your resource rows face down and exhausted.

name: Cookie McWeaksauce
rules: When Cookie enters play, each opponent puts a Chicken ally token with 0 ATK / 1 health into play.; [Exhaust] -> Destroy all ally tokens.

name: Darynus
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Protector; Inspire: Ally (Ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)
flavour: This is my elekk. There are many like it, but this one is mine.

name: Doom Lord Kazzak
rules: At the end of your turn, destroy all non-Demon allies

name: Doshura Risestrider
rules: Protector; When Doshura enters play, you may destroy target exhausted ally.
flavour: May the Earth Mother grant us her blessing and lend us the strength to protect her children.

name: Durae Crystalshield
rules: Durae can protect friendly allies.

name: Ezra Phoenix
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.); When Ezra readies, he deals 2 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Fel Cannon
rules: When a player plays a card, Fel Cannon deals 2 fire damage to that player's hero.
flavour: The Burning Legion has no need for ammunition like cannonballs. The demons utilize far more potent weaponry. - Dralor

name: Force Commander Danath Trollbane
rules: Protector; When Danath enters play, destroy target Horde ally.

name: Fungus Face McGillicutty
rules: When Fungus Face is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.
flavour: Death hasn't robbed the Forsaken of the ability to understand what you say. They're just not likely to listen.

name: Gabble
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.)

name: Gareth Ironshot
rules: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

name: Givon
rules: Protector; Opposing allies have -2 ATK while in combat with Givon.

name: Golas Swiftwind
rules: When Golad readies, exhaust target ally.
flavour: An unprepared target is a welcome one.

name: Grandma Deadsie
rules: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Grandma Deadsie.
flavour: You wouldn't hurt a harmless old lady, would you?

name: Groundshaker Earnheart
rules: When Earnheart is dealt damage, draw a card.
flavour: If brute force doesn't work, you aren't using enough.

name: Gurzuk
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),March of the Legion (EA)

name: Haaroon
rules: Demonology Hero Required; Protector

name: Hanaga Silvervein
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked); Your hero has +5 health.

name: Hota the Bloodsoaked
rules: Hota has Protector while an opponent has more allies than you.

name: Hoxie Mettlemelt
rules: At the start of your turn, Hoxie deals 2 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally for each Fire ally in your party.

name: Imp Mistress Noali
rules: Your face-down resources are also Imp Demon allies with 1 ATK / 1 health.
flavour: I command you, my minions! Wash over the enemy like a sea of fire and burn them from this plane!

name: Ingrid Shadowstorm
rules: Opposing heroes lose and can't have flip powers.

name: Instructor Antheol
rules: 1 -> This turn, target ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is a Boar. Use only once per turn.

name: Ishanah, High Priestess of the Aldor
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); At the start of each opponent's turn, he chooses an ally in his party. Gain control of that ally.
flavour: The Light cleanses all.

name: Jaedan Sunshot
rules: When you play an ability, Jaedan has Long-Range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to her.)

name: Jav Stonewall
rules: Protector, Untargetable

name: Ja'zoona
rules: Opponents pay 1 more to complete quests.

name: Jurpak
rules: 2 -> Target ally has Ferocity this turn. (It can attack immediately.)

name: Kallas Sunflame
rules: 1 -> Other Fire allies in your party have +1 ATK this turn.

name: Kiki Sparkbottom
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
flavour: Need a light?

name: Kyla Duskrider
rules: Opponents pay 1 more to play weapons.; Opponents pay 1 more to strike with weapons.

name: Magdeline Prideheart
rules: Protector; When Magdeline defends, she heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Magister Ashi
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Stealth: (Can't protect against this character.); When Ashi enters play, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Magister Lashan
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.);Sabotage: Resource (This ally can attack opposing resources.);When Lashan sabotages a resource, destroy it.

name: Magistrix Fyalenn
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); You can't discard cards.

name: Magistrix Oleinas
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Ally cards in your hand are instant.

name: Magistrix Tibrana
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Attached Ability (This ally can attack opposing attached abilities.); When Tibrana sabotages an ability, gain control of it. You may attach it to another hero or ally.

name: Marka Addington
rules: At the start of your turn, Marka deals 3 fire damage to herself.

name: Marksman Boriz
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.); Opposing heroes and allies lose and can't have Long-Range.

name: Marnie Moonlight
rules: [Exhaust] -> Marnie heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Miner Harshdin
rules: At the start of your turn, target player puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard.

name: Miner Stonedeep
rules: At the start of your turn, target player puts the top five cards of his deck into his graveyard.

name: Nazgrel, Advisor to Thrall
rules: Protector; When Nazgrel enters play, destroy target Alliance ally.

name: Neophyte Morandi
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); If an ally in your party other than Morandi would be dealt damage, it's dealt to Morandi instead.
flavour: Sworn servants of the naaru, the Aldor stand between the Legion and all those it would harm.

name: Osha Shadowdrinker
rules: When a Shadow ally in your party deals combat damage, ready up to that many of your resources.

name: Ossandran, Crematorium Master
rules: When an opposing ability, ally, equipment, or resource is destroyed, remove it from the game.
flavour: You can't make something un-undead.

name: Piana
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Piana heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.

name: Poison Tongue McGillicutty
rules: When Poison Tongue is destroyed, you may destroy target resource.

name: Rahn Grimstaff
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target hero or ally has -1 health this turn.

name: Razorsaw
rules: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.); When Razorsaw enters play, he deals 4 ranged damage to target ally in your party. When Razorsaw leaves play, he deals 4 ranged damage to target ally.

name: Retainer Jitaen
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Quest (This ally can attack opposing quests.); When Jitaen sabotages a quest, turn it face down.

name: Retainer Kedryn
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Stealth: (Can't protect against this character.); When Kedryn deals combat damage to an ally, destroy that ally.
flavour: It is not my job to think. There are others for that. My purpose is death.

name: Retainer Khorbus
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); When Khorbus deals combat damage, put him from play into his owner's hand.

name: Retainer Mythras
rules: Scryer Reputation; When Mythras enters play, target opponent gains control of him. Mythras can't attack.; At the end of your turn, destroy an ally in your party other than Mythras. If you can't, destroy Mythras.

name: Retainer Nealos
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Weapon (This ally can attack opposing weapons.); When Nealos sabotages a weapon, exhaust it. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Retainer Salvan
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Armor (This ally can attack opposing armor.); When Salvan sabotages a player's armor, exhaust all of that player's armor.

name: Retainer Zaelan
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Equipment (This ally can attack opposing equipment.); When Zaelan sabotages an equipment, put it into its owner's hand.

name: Ripper
rules: 3 -> Double Ripper's ATK this turn.
flavour: To the beasts of Outland, Azeroth is a whole new world of prey.

name: Robotic Homing Chicken
rules: Elusive.; At the start of your turn, each player rolls a die. If two or more players roll the same number, destroy Robotic Homing Chicken and all allies in those players' parties.
flavour: Decades of gnomish engineering have produced the ultimate design in fowl weaponry.

name: Routeen
rules: [Exhaust] -> Routeen deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Ruala the Spotter
rules: Exhaust your hero -> Target ally has +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: Never been good at fightin', mon. Spottin', that's my trade.

name: Rulrin
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); Untargetable

name: Scraps
rules: At the start of your turn, destroy Scraps unless you remove an ally card in any graveyard from the game.
flavour: Why is it looking at me like that?

name: Seamus Somerset
rules: Ferocity; When Seamus attacks, you may remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
flavour: Can it wait? I'm busy here.

name: Shadala
rules: When you play an ability, you may destroy target ability

name: Sharial
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); [Exhaust] -> Exhaust target equipment.

name: Shattrath City Peacekeeper
rules: Protector; Allies not named Shattrath City Peacekeeper have -1 ATK.

name: Shem Reznict
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Shem deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

name: Silea Dawnwalker
rules: When you play an ability, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: All blood elves are tied to the arcane, even those who don't practice the arts themselves.

name: Sironas
rules: At the start of your turn, the player with the most resources destroys one of them. If two or more players are tied, you choose which one destroys a resource.
flavour: The draenei's fatal flaw is their trusting nature.

name: Spider Legs McGillicutty
rules: Protector; When Spider Legs is destroyed, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

name: Syluri
rules: Protector; [Exhaust], Destroy Syluri -> Destroy target equipment.

name: Tarwila Gladespring
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); [Exhaust] -> You pay 1 less to play your next card this turn.

name: The Darkeater
rules: Other [Shadow] allies have +2 ATK / +2 health.; Non-[Shadow] allies have -2 ATK / -2 health.

name: Thulthun
rules: Opposing allies lose and can't have Elusive or Stealth.
flavour: No one can hide from the hounds of Hakkar.

name: Tracker Pardo
rules: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.); Pardo has +1 ATK for each other ally in your party.

name: Trytha Darksun
rules: At the start of each player's turn, he exhausts one of his resources.
flavour: I don't trust a source of energy until I've sampled it for myself.

name: Tyrennius Scatheblade
rules: Protector
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),March of the Legion (EA)

name: Varimathras
rules: At the end of your turn, Varimathras deals 5 shadow damage to target opposing heor or ally. When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
flavour: I'm always on the winning side.

name: Vindicator Belian
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); If an ally in your party other than Belian would be dealt damage, it's dealt to Belian instead.

name: Vindicator Dindro
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Inspire: Weapon (Ready one of your weapons during each other player's ready step.)

name: Vindicator Kaldel
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Inspire: Ally (Ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)

name: Vindicator Khorin
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); If an ally in your party other than Khorin would be dealt damage, it's dealt to Khorin instead.

name: Vindicator Melina
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Inspire: Equipment (Ready one of your equipment during each other player's ready step.)

name: Vindicator Trytan
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Protector; Inspire: Armor (Ready one of your armor during each other player's ready step.)
flavour: The Aldor and their naaru patrons actively work to be a beacon of hope in a broken world.

name: Vindicator Zalreth
rules: Aldor Reputation, Protector; When Zalreth is destroyed, you may remove him from the game. If you do, put an ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Volin Netherburn
rules: When you play an ability, Volin deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and 2 shadow damage to himself.

name: Voren'thal the Seer
rules: Scryer Reputation (can't put Aldor cards in your deck); If you would draw a card, draw two instead.
flavour: We need to show our people who Kael'thas is really working for.

name: Waldo the Decoy
rules: Exhaust your hero -> Exhaust target ally.

name: Warbringer Arix'amal
rules: Other Demons have +2 ATK.

name: Weeble
rules: Protector; When Weeble enters play, draw two cards.
flavour: Many foes have fallen to Weeble's wrath.

name: Wysko
rules: Your weapons have +1 ATK while your hero is attacking.

name: Xavar the Resourceful
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Inspire: Resource (Ready one of your resources during each other player's ready step.)

name: Yellowspine
rules: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.); Other allies in your party can protect Yellowspine.

name: Zaistor the Vigilant
rules: 1, Destroy Zaistor -> Target hero or ally can't be destroyed this turn.

name: Zandar Shadesprocket
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); When Zandar is dealt damage, also put that much on your hero.

name: Zul'that Steeltusk
rules: Damage that Holy allies in your party would deal is unpreventable.

name: Abyss Walker's Boots
rules: [Exhaust] -> Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.

name: Axe of the Legion
rules: Your other Axes have +2 ATK.; Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

name: Blade of Unquenched Thirst
rules: At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Blade of Unquenched Thirst this turn, destroy it.

name: Bladefist's Breadth
rules: When you play a weapon, ready your hero.
flavour: Ours is the TRUE Horde! The only Horde! - Kargath Bladefist

name: Bloodstained Ravager Gauntlets
rules: [Exhaust] -> Double target weapon's ATK this turn.

name: Braxxis' Staff of Slumber
rules: When you control a Form, your hero has +2 ATK while attacking and each of your armor has +2 DEF.

name: Crimson Shocker
rules: When Crimson Shocker enters play, your hero may deal 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: The heat of the Molten Core shimmers inside the wand's glowing tip.

name: Crystalfire Staff
rules: Exhaust your hero -> Target player draws a card.
flavour: Do you know how hot a jewel has to get to burn? That's a lot of power! - Blaize Brightspark

name: Demon Hide Spaulders
rules: [Exhaust] -> Each of your weapons has +1 ATK this turn.; [Exhaust] -> Each of your armor has +1 DEF this turn.

name: Demonblood Eviscerator
rules: Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

name: Demonfang Ritual Helm
rules: When an ally in your party is destroyed, each other player destroys an ally in his party.

name: Demonslayer
rules: When you strike with Demonslayer, you may destroy target Demon ally.
flavour: A weapon isn't born with a name, it earns it.

name: Devil-Stitched Leggings
rules: 3, Exhaust your hero -> Target hero or ally has -3 health this turn.

name: Doomplate Chestguard
rules: Your hero has Protector while you have five or more equipment.
flavour: I promise that you will break before it does. - Halavar

name: Fel Leather Gloves
rules: When a resource enters play, put 2 damage on its controllers hero.
flavour: The craftsmanship shows that such potent evil is not a unique trait of the corrupted.

name: Freezing Band
rules: Each opponent can't draw more than one card per turn.

name: Gauntlets of the Skullsplitter
rules: When an ally in your party attacks, you may exhaust target armor.
flavour: The head is the toughest part of the body to penetrate. If you got that beat, then armor is nothing. - Bloody Mary

name: Greatsword of Horrid Dreams
rules: As an ally enters play under an opponent's control, it loses and can't have powers until the start of that opponent's next turn.

name: Hauberk of Desolation
rules: When you strike with a weapon, you may ready an ally in your party.

name: Hemet's Elekk Gun
rules: Hemet's Elekk Gun has +4 ATK while your hero is in combat with an ally with cost 5 or more.; When you strike with Hemet's Elekk Gun, your hero has Long-Range this combat.

name: Hungering Bone Cudgel
rules: At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Hungering Bone Cudgel this turn, destroy it.
flavour: Who's using whom?

name: Mana-Etched Vestments
rules: [Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Use only if you have seven or more cards in hand.
flavour: Overflowing power has to go somewhere.

name: Manaspark Gloves
rules: At the start of your turn, if a player has fewer cards in hand than each other player, he draws a card.

name: Nexus Torch
rules: When combat damage is dealt with Nexus Torch to a defending hero, that hero's controller discards a card.
flavour: You think you know what you are going to do, but I can see you are sorely mistaken. - Kintara Wintermoon

name: Platinum Shield of the Valorous
rules: Platinum Shield of the Valorous has +1 DEF for each face-down resource you have.

name: Ring of Flowing Light
rules: [Exhaust], Exhaust X of your equipment -> Your hero heals X damage from itself.

name: Runesong Dagger
rules: When you draw a card, put a verse counter on Runesong Dagger.; 1, Remove three verse counters -> Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally.
flavour: Its lyrics are a chorus of death.

name: Scepter of the Unholy
rules: If a card or effect you control would cause an opponent to discard a card, he discards a random card instead.

name: Shadowstalker's Sash
rules: Friendly Druids and Rogues have Stealth. (Can't protect against them.)

name: Singing Crystal Axe
rules: Singing Crystal Axe enters play with four slow counters.; You pay 1 more to strike with Singing Crystal Axe for each slow counter.; When you strike with Singing Crystal Axe, remove a slow counter.

name: Skyfire Hawk-Bow
rules: When you strike with Skyfire Hawk-Bow, your hero has Long-Range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

name: Stormshield of Renewal
rules: When your hero heals damage from a friendly ally, it also heals that much from itself.

name: Terokk's Quill
rules: Terokk's Quill has +4 ATK while your hero is defending.

name: The Bringer of Death
rules: 3, [Exhaust], Destroy The Bringer of Death -> Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment. Use only on your turn.

name: The Essence Focuser
rules: If a hero or ally in your party would heal damage, it heals that much +1 instead.

name: Vengeance of the Illidari
rules: When you play an ability, ready your hero.

name: Wand of Eternal Light
rules: Damage that would be dealt with Wand of Eternal Light is unpreventable.

name: Wastewalker Tunic
rules: Wastewalker Tunic has +5 DEF while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: Give me your tiredâ€¦

name: Whispering Blade of Slaying
rules: Your other daggers have +1 ATK.; Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)
flavour: The only sound you hear is the body hitting the ground.

name: Arktos
rules: 1, Flip Arktos -> Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Arktos while defending in bear form this turn.
flavour: The Great Bear Spirit speaks to me, and it is my duty to share what it teaches.

name: Bildros Nullvoid
rules: 2, Flip Bildros -> Pet cards in your hand are instant this turn.
flavour: Fools are quick to dismiss what they don't understand as evil. I see what I do as a series of calculated risks in exchange for greater power and insight. Oh, with demons.

name: Blaize Brightspark
rules: 1, Flip Blaize -> Blaize deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt fire damage this turn.
flavour: Fire burns everyone - it doesn't care who you are!

name: Bloody Mary
rules: 2, Flip Bloody Mary -> Opposing allies have -1 ATK this turn.
flavour: Death has taught me many lessons in the art of combat. Let me show you one.

name: Bo'ja, Arcanist Absolute
rules: 5, Flip Bo'ja -> Target player readies all of his resources.

name: Chaigon Steelsight
rules: 1, Flip Chaigon -> Target ally has -3 ATK this turn.

name: Chancellor Velora
rules: 2, Flip Velora -> Velora deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The Light rewards faith, not form.

name: Dralor
rules: 4, Flip Dralor -> Look at target player's hand and choose an ally card. He discards that card. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Fewer witnesses. I like that.

name: Forang Deathrattle
rules: 3, Flip Forang -> Forang deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from himself for each damage dealt this way. Use only on your turn.

name: Halavar
rules: Flip Halavar -> You pay 1 less to play your next Two-Handed weapon this turn.
flavour: The Horde is prepared to meet any threat head on. Perhaps you'd like a demonstration?

name: Hekto Starspire
rules: 4, Flip Hekto -> Destroy target attacking ally.

name: Kassandra Flameheart
rules: 2, Flip Kassandra -> Target Pet has +3 ATK this turn.

name: Keegana Silvershield
rules: 5, Flip Keegana -> Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. Keegana deals 1 holy damage to each of them. Use only on your turn.

name: Kintara Wintermoon
rules: 3, Flip Kintara -> Target player puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand. Use only on your turn.

name: Memri the Channeler
rules: 2, Flip Memri -> Memri deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally for each Totem you have.

name: Taheo Skyspeaker
rules: 4, Flip Taheo -> Choose one: Taheo deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally; or Taheo heals 6 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Urrth
rules: 3, Flip Urrth -> Draw a card for each Totem you have.

name: Zag'zil
rules: X, Flip Zag'zil -> Destroy target weapon with cost X. Use only on your turn.

name: A Final Blow
rules: If you played an equipment this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: A Traitor Among Us
rules: If an ally in your party was destroyed this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Against the Legion
rules: If an opponent has more resources than you, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: You've proven you're not tainted by the Legion's touch, and the enemy of my enemy is my friend. - Altruis the Sufferer

name: An OOX of Your Own
rules: During your turn, pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put three Mechanical Chicken ally tokens with 0 ATK / 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, remove them from the game and draw a card for each token removed this way.

name: Buying Time
rules: During your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: You and target opponent each put the top card of your decks in your resource rows face down and exhausted.
flavour: If you can keep their engineers and tinkerers busy, it would greatly slow down their progress, buying me the time I need. - Altruis the Sufferer

name: Demonic Contamination
rules: During your turn, put 1 damage on each of three different allies in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: While many creatures here have already undergone radical changes, they continue to mutate. - Thiah Redmane

name: Dousing the Flames of Protection
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Choose a hero or ally in your party. Damage that character would deal is unpreventable this turn.

name: Falling to Corruption
rules: Destroy two of your resources and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: Forces of Jaedenar
rules: If you played an ability this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Forge Camp: Annihilated
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Of course! We will use their own weapons against them! - Altruis the Sufferer

name: Gurok the Usurper
rules: [Exhaust] -> Choose one of your quests. Gurok the Usurper has that quest's powers this turn.
flavour: Gurok must be summoned. You summon Gurok and you destroy. - Gordawg

name: Hellfire Fortifications
rules: If you played an ally this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The fortifications of Hellfire Citadel are the keys to supremacy in the region.

name: Levixus the Soul Caller
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a random card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: You will find Levixus on the uppermost ruins of Auchindoun. He stands amidst a storm of soulsâ€¦ - Nitrin the Learned

name: Mission: The Abyssal Shelf
rules: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Roll six dice one at a time from 6 inches above play. For each die that lands on an opposing ally, put damage on it equal to that roll.

name: Natural Remedies
rules: Pay 0 to complete this quest.;Reward: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one on top of your deck and the other on the bottom.
flavour: Beware, I sense an external force at play hereâ€¦This is not natural! - Earthbinder Galandna Nightbreeze

name: Pride of the Fel Horde
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you have no ready resources, draw a card.
flavour: Fel Horde troops under the command of Kargath Bladefist are a brutal, battle-hardened lot fortified by foul magics. - Field Commander Romus

name: Retribution of the Light
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: All players shuffle their graveyards into their decks.
flavour: Return to Shadow Hold, kill Trey's torturer, and find his remains. There is no reason we can't tie off all these loose ends while Arko'narin mourns in her own private way. - Jessir Moonbow

name: Survey the Land
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you control an ability, ally, or equipment, draw a card, or two cards if you control all three.
flavour: Even the smallest detail that you may think inconsequential could be useful for our purposes. - Altruis the Sufferer

name: The Blood is Life
rules: During your turn, destroy an ally in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's health.

name: The Formation of Felbane
rules: Pay 7 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally, equipment, and quest card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Name of the Beast
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Choose ability, ally, equipment, or quest. Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed card of that kind into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Root of All Evil
rules: During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Turn target quest face down.

name: The Spirit Polluted
rules: Put 3 damage on your hero and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Toxic Horrors
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Choose up to two players. Each of them draws a card.
flavour: I believe that the Deadwood furbolg may be gathering these elements from the elementals living in the Irontree Woodsâ€¦ - Donova Snowden

name: Wanted: Durn the Hungerer
rules: If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Durn's murderous grip has been loosed! Nagrand has a brighter tomorrow because of you, hero. Well done! - Warden Bullrok

name: You Are Rakh'likh, Demon
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if a Demon is in your party.
flavour: Should you defeat the Defiler, bring back his horn. It will become a symbol of hope for all that view it - proof that heroes do exist in this war-torn world. - Fallen Hero of the Horde

name: Seamus Somerset
rules: Ferocity; When Seamus attacks, you may remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
flavour: Can it wait? I'm busy here.

name: Runesong Dagger
rules: When you draw a card, put a verse counter on Runesong Dagger.; 1, Remove three verse counters -> Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally.
flavour: Its lyrics are a chorus of death.

name: Robotic Homing Chicken
rules: Elusive.; At the start of your turn, each player rolls a die. If two or more players roll the same number, destroy Robotic Homing Chicken and all allies in those players' parties.
flavour: Decades of gnomish engineering have produced the ultimate design in fowl weaponry.

name: Puncture
rules: Destroy target ally or equipment.

name: Piercing Howl
rules: Fury Hero Required; Target opponent puts three allies from his party on top of their owner's decks.
flavour: A warrior's deafening howl can break an enemy's ranks from within.

name: Paper Airplane
rules: Put Paper Airplane on top of target player's deck. (He owns it for the rest of the game.)
flavour: Whee!

name: Kiting
rules: Attach to target ally.; 1 -> Target hero or ally can't deal combat damage to attached ally this turn. Use only once per turn.

name: Ishanah, High Priestess of the Aldor
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); At the start of each opponent's turn, he chooses an ally in his party. Gain control of that ally.
flavour: The Light cleanses all.

name: Invoke the Nether
rules: Remove all allies from the game.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: It all ends here. - Forang Deathrattle

name: Gurok the Usurper
rules: [Exhaust] -> Choose one of your quests. Gurok the Usurper has that quest's powers this turn.
flavour: Gurok must be summoned. You summon Gurok and you destroy. - Gordawg

name: Forces of Jaedenar
rules: If you played an ability this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Falling to Corruption
rules: Destroy two of your resources and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: Dreamstate
rules: Balance Hero Required; Ongoing: When you play a Balance ability, draw a card.
flavour: Those who walk the Emerald Dream see the waking world more clearly.

name: Doshura Risestrider
rules: Protector; When Doshura enters play, you may destroy target exhausted ally.
flavour: May the Earth Mother grant us her blessing and lend us the strength to protect her children.

name: An OOX of Your Own
rules: During your turn, pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put three Mechanical Chicken ally tokens with 0 ATK / 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, remove them from the game and draw a card for each token removed this way.

name: Swipe
rules: Ongoing: When Swipe enters play, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.; Your hero is in bear form. (Has Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
flavour: Maybe forming into a line wasn't such a good idea.

name: The Formation of Felbane
rules: Pay 7 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally, equipment, and quest card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Root of All Evil
rules: During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Turn target quest face down.

name: Thundering Footsteps
rules: As an additional cost to play Thundering Footsteps, stomp your feet. Put a Mechanical ally token named Fel Reaver with 10 ATK / 10 health into play.
flavour: Do you hear something?

name: Touch of Darkness
rules: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. If a hero is dealt damage this way, its controller discards a card.
flavour: Even a brush with the shadow can teat a mind apart.

name: Zandar Shadesprocket
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); When Zandar is dealt damage, also put that much on your hero.

name: Devil-Stitched Leggings
rules: 3, Exhaust your hero -> Target hero or ally has -3 health this turn.

name: Gurzuk
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Silea Dawnwalker
rules: When you play an ability, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: All blood elves are tied to the arcane, even those who don't practice the arts themselves.

name: Tyrennius Scatheblade
rules: Protector
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Whispering Blade of Slaying
rules: Your other daggers have +1 ATK.; Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)
flavour: The only sound you hear is the body hitting the ground.
